title: Background on the President's lunch with business leaders | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




July 31, 2009

 



Background on the President's lunch with business leaders




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  ---------------------------------------------  FOR IMMEDIATE RELASE                        July 31, 2009 The President had lunch with the following business leaders today in the Private Dining Room: Ivan Seidenberg, CEO of Verizon and Chairman of the Business Roundtable  Mike Duke, CEO of Wal-Mart  Dan DiMicco, CEO of Nucor  Howard Schultz, CEO of Starbucks
